statements: DELETE FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE location = 'Garden' AND pest_type = 'Rat';
DELETE FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE id = 10 AND location = 'Garden';
DELETE FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE pest_type = 'Rat' OR (infestation_date > '2021-01-01' AND infestation_date < '2021-12-31');
DELETE FROM pest_control_methods WHERE cost > 500.00 AND effectiveness_rating < 5;
DELETE FROM infestation_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND report_details LIKE '%serious infestation%';
DELETE FROM infestation_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND site_id = 5;
